---
title: Lit Review Table
author: Kamryn Mansfield
---


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
library(tidyverse)
```

```

ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
library(knitr)
```
:::


Read in the csv of the lit review table:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
lit_tbl <- read_csv("lit_review_table.csv") |>
  select(Title, Authors = Author, citation = `bibtex name`, Year, Dataset, Findings = `Main Findings`)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr .hidden}

```
Rows: 35 Columns: 21
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (10): Author, Title, bibtex name, Brief summary of what the study is abo...
dbl (11): Study Number, Year, Use Consumer Expenditure Survey Data?, Transpo...

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```


:::
:::


Output the table:


::: {#tbl-lit-summary .cell tbl-cap='Summary of the Literature' tbl-alt='A table listing and describing the literature used in this review'}

```{.r .cell-code .hidden}
#| label: tbl-lit-summary
#| tbl-cap: "Summary of the Literature"
#| tbl-alt: "A table listing and describing the literature used in this review"

kable(lit_tbl)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
